summary: The Bowery Boys investigate a murder, and all the evidence points to the involvement of the notorious Loop gang.
cast: Leo Gorcey|Huntz Hall|Gabriel Dell|Mickey Knox|Edward Ryan|Richard Benedict|William 'Billy' Benedict|David Gorcey|Joe Turkel|Pepe Hern|Benny Bartlett|Bernard Gorcey|Ray Walker|Rory Mallinson|Jean Dean|William Forrest|Peter Virgo|Tristram Coffin|Herbert Patterson|Doretta Johnson|Dorothy Abbott|Jane Adams|Marie Blake|Tom Coleman|Wade Crosby|Jack Gargan|Roy Gordon|Don C. Harvey|Tom Monroe|John Morgan|Jack Mower|William J. O'Brien|Lee Phelps|Carl Sklover|Larry Steers|Chalky Williams
title: Angels in Disguise
